summary: Three young martial arts masters emerge from the back streets of Hong Kong to help the powerless fight injustice.
cast: Yuk Long Wong|Louis Koo|Isabella Leong|Ella Koon|Donnie Yen|Nicholas Tse|Shawn Yue|Jie Dong|Xiaoran Li|Wah Yuen|Kuan Tai Chen|Xing Yu|Vincent Sze|Tommy Yuen|Sam Yu-Sum Chan|Alan Lam|Chung-Deng Lam|Sheren Tang|Hua Yan|Kang Yu|Howard Sit|Chun-Ho Tam|Co Co Chan|Wing-Lun Lam|Patrick Mölleken|Tung So|Xiao Li Yuan
director: Director: Wilson Yip (as Yip Wai Shun)
title: Dragon Tiger Gate
